thing-type.label: 700342 10 Year Smoke Detector
thing-type.description: 10 Year Smoke Detector<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis smoke detector will report smoke alarms wirelessly and securily into a Z-Wave network and is able to control other devices using associations The smoke detectorâ€™s sensor head is certified with the Q quality label, conforms DIN EN 14604 and satisfies all contemporary legal requirements. The High-End 10-years smoke detector offers a large test button conveniently accessible even with a broomstick when mounted on the ceiling. The smoke chamber is monitored electronically to avoid any malfunction and wrong alerts. The device will also report its end of life to make sure it is getting replaced on time. Tampering a smoke detector by removing it from the mounting base will issue a wireless alarm command as well.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtSecure Inclusion: Push the button for 3 seconds<br /&gtUnsecure Inclusion: Push the button for 1 seconds</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPush the button for 1 second</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPush the button shortly to wake up the device.</p&gt

parameter.description: Value of Off-Command<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value is sent as BASIC Set to Association Group 2 when an Smoke Alarm is cleared.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: All devices in this group will receive a BASIC SET command on Smoke Alarms. Configuration parameter 3 and 4 will define the BASIC command sent.
